ygData.subject: Re: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Although your other ideas are nice, I must disagree with your assessment of the Libretto.  I have used the Libretto on NUMEROUS occasions to determine
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:03 AM 9/21/99 -1000, you wrote:
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>If enough people on this list thinks its a good idea, lets submit a petition
>to have the level 14 song replaced. As most of you are aware, the song
>currently has almost no usefulness. All magic items come already
>identified. All you have to do is right click on it. The only situations I
>have heard of the song providing any additional information is when it is
>sung while holding a head. The name of the person who the head used to be
>attached to can be discovered. This is only useful if you are turning in
>the head as part of a quest. I am unaware of any other uses for this song.

Although your other ideas are nice, I must disagree with your assessment of
the Libretto. I have used the Libretto on NUMEROUS occasions to determine
otherwise hidden information. Examples:
1) Ran across a ring lying on the bottom of a lake. Silver, and bonus to
charisma... Quest item? Hrm... Used Libretto to learn former owner's name.

2) Discovered that there are three different kinds of jum jum stalks, but
they all look the same until you identify them.

3) Only way to tell what Nybright necklaces you already have if you've
forgotten.

4) Found a gold earring dropped on the ground in Unrest. Libretto told me
it was a Pirate's Earring, which I later discovered to be part of another
quest....

So, don't dis the Libretto just yet...

As to your other suggestions:

>1) A combination heal/stamina song that combines Jaxan's and Hymn. The
>power of the song can either be the same as the two original songs or toned
>down versions, perhaps 75% of the original values.

A little too powerful, even at only 75%.

>2) A song that increases agility and/or increases the Dodge skill.

I would rather see an intelligence booster at this level. Be really nice
for trade skills ;)

>3) A song that would teleport the bard to the nearest bards guild.

That would be a MUCH higher level (35+) if at all.


>4) A song that has a major taunt effect above and beyond that or normal
>bard songs.

Now THAT would be handy...

>5) A song that binds a bard to his current location. I don't think this
>one would ever have a chance of getting approved but we can include it if
>thats what everyone wants.

<rant> I've said it once, I'll say it again - I don't want to bind. I want
NPCs that I can pay to bind me :( I'm sick of spending an hour in a zone
shouting and shouting myself hoarse. Erudin, Feerott/Oggukk, and
Innothule/Grobb are some of the worst places to try and get bound. </rant>


>I'm in the Army and will be going out on a field exercise this Thursday for
>the next week. Assuming this message generates a lot of positive response,
>someone else will have to facilitate discussion on this issue until then. I
>will write up the petition when I get back next week if we all come to an
>agreement.
>

Good luck, and we'll keep the C-rations warm for ya ;)


Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
